Package: org.grails.plugins.elasticsearch.mapping

[Groovy] Class SearchableClassPropertyMapping

    • org.grails.plugins.elasticsearch.mapping.SearchableClassPropertyMapping

    • Custom searchable property mapping.

          Returns:
          searchable property mapping information.

        • void validate(ElasticSearchContextHolder contextHolder)

          Validate searchable mappings for this property. NOTE: We can leave the validation of the options from SEARCHABLE_MAPPING_OPTIONS to ElasticSearch as it will throw an error if a mapping value is invalid.
